data.introduce: 用于查询出票限额，即当前office下所有航司的票池额度，以及已使用的票池额度情况。
data.business:
用于查询出票限额，即当前office下所有航司的票池额度，以及已使用的票池额度情况。
备注：只支持查询，不支持修改。
data.functions: 1、自动查询出当前 OFFICE 下所有航司的出票限额列表
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirQueryTQTDRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"出票限额查询请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"UAL","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"变更后的航空公司二字码","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"UC","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"变更后的Office编号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"Office","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"Office号","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirQueryTQTDRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票限额查询返回","children":[{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Office","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]},{"name":"AirlineQuotaInfos","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航司结算列表","children":[{"name":"AirlineQuotaInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"AirlineCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航司二字代码","children":[]},{"name":"CurrQuota","type":"int","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"结算周期可出的票数量","children":[]},{"name":"TktIssued","type":"int","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"结算周期已经出票的数量","children":[]},{"name":"TempQuota","type":"int","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"结算周期临时可出的票数量","children":[]},{"name":"QuotaNext","type":"int","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"下一个结算周期可出的票数量","children":[]},{"name":"WebQuota","type":"int","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"结算周期weblink可出的票数量","children":[]},{"name":"WebIssued","type":"int","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"结算周期weblink已经出票的数量","children":[]}]}]}]}]
